imdb.plot outline: The Ski Channel is proud to present the life of Canadian freeskier Sean Pettit in its original series, Winter Sessions. By the age of 11, Pettit began his professional ski career and became the youngest athlete to be signed by Red Bull at 13 years old. With his natural athletic ability, Sean has conquered backcountry skiing in competition and video parts, winning multiple awards. The Ski Channel presents its original series "Winter Sessions" dedicated to unique athletes who go above and beyond expectations in the great outdoors. It is with great applause that we celebrate the lives of these featured individuals for their dedication to their sport and inspiring accomplishments.
imdb.title: The Sound of Winter Sean Pettit
akas: The Sound of Winter Sean Pettit (United States)
plot: The Ski Channel is proud to present the life of Canadian freeskier Sean Pettit in its original series, Winter Sessions.

The Ski Channel is proud to present the life of Canadian freeskier Sean Pettit in its original series, Winter Sessions. By the age of 11, Pettit began his professional ski career and became the youngest athlete to be signed by Red Bull at 13 years old. With his natural athletic ability, Sean has conquered backcountry skiing in competition and video parts, winning multiple awards. The Ski Channel presents its original series "Winter Sessions" dedicated to unique athletes who go above and beyond expectations in the great outdoors. It is with great applause that we celebrate the lives of these featured individuals for their dedication to their sport and inspiring accomplishments.
